ygData.subject: RTSP anyone?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, admittedly I completely missed the existence of RTSP[1]. It is a massive spec, sort of a redefined 2616 and stuff on top. I am trying the shortcut here:

Hi,

admittedly I completely missed the existence of RTSP[1].

It is a mass=
ive spec, sort of a redefined 2616 and stuff on top.

I am trying the short=
cut here: has anyone ever looked at it an has thoughts whether it is a part=
icularly good or particularly bad example of protocol design?

There is, fo=
r example stuff like a SET_PROPERTY method which surely should have been PU=
T /foo/<property> :-)


Jan

[1] http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2326
